001000_00000_01001_0000000000001010   //addi $t1,$0,10
000000_01001_01001_01001_00000_100000 // add $t1, $t1, $t1 // $t1 = 20
000000_01001_01001_01001_00000_100000 // add $t1, $t1, $t1 // $t1 = 40
001000_00000_01000_0000000000000001   //addi $t0,$0,1
001000_00000_01000_0000000000000001   //addi $t0,$0,1
000000_01001_01001_01010_00000_100000 // add $t2, $t1, $t1 // $t2 = 80, but $t2 becomes 40
